LanguageData.YS_SettingsDajiResurrectMechsTooltip: Prevent Deathless Daji to resurrect mechanoids in addition to flesh and bone pawns.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsDajiResurrectWeaponsTooltip: Prevent pawns from retrieving a weapon in their immediate vicinity upon resurrection.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsDajiCrimsonSeverityGainToolti: Alter how far a pawn's Crimson Psychosis progresses upon his or her resurrection by Daji.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsFanGraceTooltip:
The minimum in-game days before Farseer Fan begins to tell the future at the start of the game.

Increasing this value will cause Farseer Fan to take longer at the start of the game before she starts predicting incidents (i.e. from one day to four days). Decreasing this value will shorten the period of time at the start of the game before she predicts any incidents.

WARNING! It is not recommended to set this value too low- it will force only diseases to be predicted.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsFanPredictTooltip:
Defines the maximum time Farseer Fan can forecast out.

Increasing this can cause Farseer Fan to predict incidents that are farther in the future (i.e. from five days to 15 days), while decreasing it limits how far.

WARNING! It is not recommended to set this value too high, as it can cause long periods without any incidents. Likewise, setting this too low can force incidents to occur too frequently.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsFanPredictDetailTooltip: Make predictions more specific by adding which hour an incident will occur.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsKaiyiStartTooltip: The amount of karma a player starts with in a game. Only works when beginning the game with Kaiyi.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsKaiyiPointFactorPosTooltip: Alters the extent of the effect of positive karma on a incident's points, if it uses it.
LanguageData.YS_SettingsKaiyiPointFactorNegTooltip: Alters the extent of the effect of negative karma on a incident's points, if it uses it.
